code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React from'react';import FormTemplate from'./form';import{apiHost}from'config';import axios from'axios';import isLoggedIn from'utils/isLoggedIn';var LoginForm=function LoginForm(){if(isLoggedIn())window.location="/portal";var login=function login(authRequest){axios.post("".concat(apiHost,"/authenticate"),authRequest).then(function(response){var jwt=response.data.jwt;localStorage.setItem('jwt',jwt);window.location='/portal';});};var fields={email:{displayName:"Email",type:"email",value:""},password:{displayName:"Password",type:"password",value:""}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormTemplate,{fields:fields,submit:login,header:"Sign In"});};export default LoginForm;
